com.sun.jini.outrigger

Interface StorableObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StorableResource

    public interface StorableObject
    Interface that must be implemented by objects that must persist their state.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sun Microsystems, Inc.
    See Also:
    LogOps
